roleset.name: express strong disapproval of
roleset.note: CONDEMN-V NOTES: Member of VNcls judgement-33, suspect-81. (from condemn.01-v)

example.name: straight transitive
example.text: The two, Szeto Wah and Martin Lee, were deemed unfit because they had condemned China's crackdown on its pro-democracy movement.
example.arg: China's crackdown on its pro-democracy movement

example.name: condemn as
example.text: A White House spokesman condemned the truce suspension as ``deplorable'' but brushed off talk of renewing military funding for the insurgents.

example.name: condemn to
example.text: For instance, juries-1 would have *trace*-1 to consider specific ``aggravating'' and ``mitigating'' factors before *trace*-1 deciding whether *trace*-1 to condemn someone to death.

example.name: with grounds as gerund
example.text: The internal investigation also condemned MiniScribe's auditors, Coopers& Lybrand, for allegedly ignoring numerous red flags.
example.arg: for allegedly ignoring numerous red flags

example.name: with grounds as full clause
example.text: A Poquet spokesman, for example, condemns the Atari Portfolio because it requires three batteries while the Poquet needs only two.
example.arg: because it requires three batteries while the Poquet needs only two

example.name: args 2 and 3 together
example.text: Mary condemned John to prison for his habit of waking her with icy-cold water.
example.arg: for his habit of waking her with icy-cold water
